column2: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
column12: If you checked off any problems, how difficult  have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

column2: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
column4: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
column5: Feeling tired or having little energy
column7: Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
column8: Trouble concentrating on things such as reading the newspaper or watching television
column9: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed, or the opposite: being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
column10: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
